string.name: STR_BM_MSG_TEST
string.body: [%username] is currently playing on a trial account and can wear this item only after converting over to a subscription. To convert your account, please visit [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_BM_MSG_EQUIP_ITEM_RESTRICT_01
string.body: [%username] is currently playing on a trial account and can wear this item only after converting over to a subscription. To convert your account, please visit [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GET_EXP_BOOST_VITAL_BONUS
string.body: You have obtained %num1 XP from %0 (Strong Energy of Repose %num2).

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GET_EXP_BOOST_VITAL_MAKEUP_BONUS
string.body: You have obtained %num1 XP from %0 (Strong Energy of Repose %num2, Energy of Relief %num3).

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_COMBAT_MU_EXP_GAIN_BOOST_VITAL_BONUS
string.body: You have obtained %0% (Strong Energy of Repose %num1).

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_COMBAT_MU_EXP_GAIN_BOOST_VITAL_MAKEUP_BONUS
string.body: You have obtained %0% (Strong Energy of Repose %num1, Energy of Relief %num2).

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GET_EXP2_BOOST_VITAL_BONUS
string.body: You have obtained %num0 XP (Strong Energy of Repose %num1).

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GET_EXP2_BOOST_VITAL_MAKEUP_BONUS
string.body: You have obtained %num0 XP (Strong Energy of Repose %num1, Energy of Relief %num2).

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_EQUIP_ITEM_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a trial account and can wear this item only when you convert to subscription. To convert your account, please visit [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_COMBINE_ITEM_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot craft any more items. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_ITEM_DECOMPOSE_DAY_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can extract a maximum of %num0 items per week. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GATHER_DAY_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can extract a maximum of %num0 items per week. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GATHER_SKILL_LEVEL_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can only extract from items that require an Essencetapping skill lower than %0 points. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_EXTRACT_GATHER_DAY_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can extract a maximum of %num0 items per week. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_EXTRACT_GATHER_SKILL_LEVEL_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a [%bm_account_type] and can only extract from items that require an Aethertapping skill lower than %0 points. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_SELLGOLD_DAY_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a [%bm_account_type] and can only sell items up to %0 Kinah a day. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_VENDOR_SELL_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a trial account and have reached your maximum daily use of the Resale window. To sell more items, please convert your account by visiting [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_VENDOR_BUY_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a [%bm_account_type] and have reached your maximum daily use of the Resale window. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_LEVEL_UP_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a [%bm_account_type] and can grow only up to L%0. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GUILD_CREATE_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot create a legion. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_GUILD_WAREHOUSE_USE_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a [%bm_account_type] and cannot access the Legion Warehouse. To remove this restriction, please visit [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_EXCHANGE_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a trial account and can trade with others only when you convert to subscription. To convert your account, please visit [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_EXCHANGE_KINA_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a trial account and can trade Kinah with others only when you convert to subscription. To convert your account, please visit [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_EXCHANGE_ITEM_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a trial account and can trade with others only when you convert to subscription. To convert your account, please visit [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_PERSONAL_SHOP_OPEN_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a [%bm_account_type] and cannot open a private store. To remove this restriction, please visit [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_PERSONAL_SHOP_BUY_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a [%bm_account_type] and cannot use private stores. To remove this restriction, please visit [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_MAIL_WRITE_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and cannot attach items or Kinah to a letter. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_MAIL_WRITE_WITH_ITEM_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a[%bm_account_type] and cannot attach items or Kinah to a letter. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_MAIL_WRITE_ONLY_TO_FRIENDS
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can send messages only to your friends. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_CHAT_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can only use chatting once you reach L%0 or higher. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_SHOUT_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can only shout you reach L%0 or higher. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_WHISPER_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can only whisper once you reach L%0 or higher. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_WHISPER_EXCEPT_FRIENDS_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can only whisper to your friends and not others until you reach L%0 or higher. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_CHANNEL_CHAT_RESTRICT
string.body: You are a [%bm_account_type] and can only use channel chatting once you reach L%0 or higher. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_VENDOR_VENDOR_USE_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a[%bm_account_type] and cannot use the Resale window. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_WAREHOUSE_USE_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a [%bm_account_type] and cannot use the Private Warehouse. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_CHAR_SLOT_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a[%bm_account_type] and cannot create any more characters To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_TRADEGOLD_DAY_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a[%bm_account_type] and cannot trade more than %0 Kinah per day. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_QUEST_ACQUIRE_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a [%bm_account_type] and cannot undertake any more quests. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_MSG_F2P_PARTY_SEARCH_RESTRICT
string.body: You are currently playing on a[%bm_account_type] and cannot use the find group and apply for group features. To remove this restriction, please visit the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_F2P_MSG_NOTICE_PACK_EXPIRE_TIME
string.body: The %1 effect will be over in %DURATIONTIME0.

string.name: STR_F2P_MSG_WARNING_PACK_EXPIRE_TIME
string.body: The %1 effect will be over in %DURATIONTIME0. You may not be unable to use boosting effects or certain game functions anymore. To enjoy the game without limitations, please visit the Aion Shop [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_F2P_MSG_PACK_EXPIRED
string.body: The %0 effect has expired and may cause the boost to disappear or partially limited gameplay. Additional Boost items can be found in the Aion Shop. [%shoplink]
